name: User Based Filtering
title: Recommender Systems
author: Prem Melville  & Vikas Sindhwani
publisher: C. Sammut, G. Webb (eds.), Encyclopedia of Machine Learning Â© Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg

parameter.name: k
parameter.description: The number of neighbors which are querried to create the aggregate.

parameter.name: min_double
parameter.description: The minimal double value which is considered != 0

parameter.name: correlation
parameter.description: The type of correlation function used for the algorithm. Possible values are 'cosine' and 'pearson'.
